example.parse: (IP (LCP-SBJ (NP (UCP (NP (NN 地铁) (NN 车站)) (CC 和) (LCP (NP (NN 路)) (LC 边))) (NP (NN 广告牌))) (LC 上)) (VP (ADVP (AD 已经)) (VP (VV 换上) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-TPC (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-SBJ (NN 印刷)) (VP (VA 精美))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 演唱会)) (ADJP (JJ 大幅)) (NP (NN 海报))))) (PU 。))
